HI

kunai are not knives.

they are metal slabs hammered out to make a type of
trowel. the edges are not even sharp.

the tipes may be pointed but at the end of the day if
your jamming the thing between rocks and into the
earth a sharp edge is a waste of time.

they were used when fighting for striking or jabbing
the way you would with a club or stick.

If I tried to cut with a (knife) kunai then I would
get a friction burn before it cut me.

paul



--- Daniele Frison <eriel666@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
I always seen kunai used by those phantomatic ninja..
Kunai is a sort of knife (A SORT OF!!) but I don't
know if also samurai used it.
Actually one should know how much truth is inside all
stories about ninja...probably almost everything we
see through films, anime, manga it not refers to
truth..but this is only my opinion!
For sure I only can say that I saw an old japanese
print about a ninja who was dressed like a normal
samurai, so the legend about their clothes I don't
think is true.
Probably this mail has any sense at all....
sorry
Daniele

elisa <ombraegrazia@...> wrote:

Thanks!

elisa
